sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The accusation comes from a report by Fossil Free Politics, a coalition of environmental associations that organizes protests in Brussels.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: And every country has a different story.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: In Italy, energy giant Eni saw its net profits more than double due to rising gas prices, but avoided a windfall tax of 25% on it, decided by the former government led by Mario Draghi.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The law was written so badly that all energy companies have appealed legally against this law.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: And so from the initial expected income, which was 11 billion euro, the actual income that was generated by the tax was 2.8 billion.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: In the Czech Republic, the owner of energy company EPH publicly threatened to move one of his companies abroad due to the proposed windfall tax, initially designed to cover profits made from 2022 with 100% tax for that year.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: They were able to postpone the implementation of the windfall tax for 2023, so most of their profits are not taxed by the windfall tax. And also, they were able to soften it that it's not 100%, but only 60% desde 2023.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: España también vio algunos problemas en la aplicación de su taxa de caída, un levy de 1,2% de los ingresos de las empresas desde el año 2022, cuando sus beneficios aumentaron por 35%, como explica esta activista. han recurrido esta tasa en un contencioso administrativo que todavía no está resuelto, porque lo que dicen es que lo que la Unión Europea recomendaba era una tasa a los beneficios y no a los ingresos, y que esto les perjudica.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: En septiembre del año pasado, la EU se acuerdó de un levy temporario en las compañías de combustible, aplicado en beneficios que superan el 20% de la media de las compañías. Last year, the E.U. agreed on a temporary levy on fossil fuel companies, applied on profits exceeding 20 percent of a company's average. Activists claim the tax was watered down by a fossil fuel lobbying association and put posters on E.U. institutions' headquarters to denounce this.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: Perry starred as the eccentric and sarcastic Chandler Bing in all ten seasons of the iconic US sitcom.

sentences.sentence: He was found unresponsive in his L.A. home on Sunday and later pronounced dead by police.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: He was such a heartwarming, kind, uplifting person that I feel like everyone could just turn on the TV and feel immediately comforted by him.

sentences.sentence: I actually watch it almost every day, so I think he brought a lot of himself into the character and transformed it into something more than what it was.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: While the 54-year-old was beloved for his sharp wit and goofy mannerisms on screen, he battled addiction and serious health problems off screen, many of which he wrote about in his memoir, Friends, Lovers, and The Big Terrible Thing.
